content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello, Bo Li. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. As for the rental price, I'm open to discussing it with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I think it would be fair if I pay 1000 Euros per month. What do you think?

I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month.
name: Bo Li from China

content: I'm glad to hear that we have reached an agreement on the rental price. 1000 Euros per month is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in a good location. I hope you enjoy your stay in the apartment and that it meets your needs. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you very much. I will sign the rental agreement tomorrow.

TERMINATE.
name: Bo Li from China

content: I'm sorry to hear that you have decided to terminate the negotiation. Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.
name: Heinrich Heine
